column4: feisty install alternate: "no common cd-rom drive was detected". before that it loads a floppy which doesn't exist in the box. hardware: lg e500-sprbg. wtf?
kernel doesn't like your motherboard/disk-controller. see if a USB-install would be a way out
maybe another way besides cd or usb?
see !install to learn about ways to install from the net. but if install-kernel already makes trouble... maybe see !boot if different boot-options change something
